attributes.action: Increase ALL prision sentences to really deter new crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our oprision service is in a  state, the country is full of light prision sentences which never discourage people from committing more crimes, I suggest we at least double all sentences and remove all luxurys from prisions, no TV, no Pool, make prision a nightmare to prevent people from getting into this life of grime

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
